items.title: Brokerage Radar: Morgan Stanley 'Underweight' on Wipro, JM Financial initiates coverage on Piramal Pharma with 'Buy'
items.description: Check out the latest brokerage calls and analyst comments on the stocks in action today. Our coverage includes Wipro, Delhivery, Piramal Pharma and more.

items.title: Eye on Zomato, Swiggy as GST Council weighs lower tax on online food delivery, says CNBC-TV18
items.description: The tax cut, which may take effect from January 1, 2022, would disallow delivery platforms from claiming input tax credits, sources told the channel.

items.title: Texmaco Rail shares in focus on winning order worth Rs 187.41 crore
items.description: Texmaco Rail and Engineering Share Price | The share touched a 52-week high of Rs 296.60 and a 52-week low of Rs 141.85 on 12 July, 2024 and 13 March, 2024, respectively. Currently, the stock is trading 22.76 percent below its 52-week high and 61.51 percent above its 52-week low.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty indicates a negative start; US markets mixed, Asia gains
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: The Nasdaq closed at a record high on Monday and the S&P 500 also rose as investors gauged the latest economic data while looking toward the Federal Reserve's final policy announcement of the year later in the week to gauge the path of interest rates. The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 110.58 points, or 0.25%, to 43,717.48, the S&P 500 gained 22.99 points, or 0.38%, to 6,074.08 and the Nasdaq Composite gained 247.17 points, or 1.24%, to 20,173.89.

items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The GIFT Nifty is indicating a flat to negative start for the day.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade HDFC Life, HUL, Piccadilly Agro, Jindal Photo, Wockhardt, SRM Contractors, and others on Tuesday?
items.description: The market is expected to consolidate further before potentially entering a fresh leg of upward movement. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: Stock Radar: HDFC Bank, Indus Towers, Gravita India, HCC, Texmaco Rail, Nitco, Jungle Camps, Toss The Coin in focus on Tuesday
items.description: Stocks like Rail Vikas Nigam, Varun Beverages, Vedanta, Abbott India, Hindustan Construction Company, Gabriel Pet Straps, Everest Industries, RailTel Corporation of India, Wipro, Hitech Corporation, SRF, and GMR Airports Infrastructure will also be in focus on December 17.

items.title: Live: Nifty To Remain In Consolidation Mode? HDFC Bank, Swiggy & Zomato In Focus| Opening Bell
items.description: The Indian benchmark indices erased some of the previous session gains to end lower on December 16 with Nifty below 24,700 amid selling seen in the IT, metal, oil & gas and FMCG names, while buying in realty, PSU bank, media restricted further fall. At close, the Sensex was down 384.55 points or 0.47 percent at 81,748.57, and the Nifty was down 100.05 points or 0.40 percent at 24,668.25. This morning global cues are mixed with Dow clocking an eight-day losing streak, its longest string of losses since 2018 but the Nasdaq managed to hit a record high. The GIFT Nifty is hinting at another day of muted and negative open. HDFC Bank, Mankind Pharma are among the stocks to watch! Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Ajit Mishra--SVP, Technical Research, Religare Broking and Raj Vyas, VP Research, Teji Mandi

items.title: Agri Picks Report December 17, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, Farmers in Gujarat have sown rabi crops over 3.7 million hectares as of Monday, down 8.9% from 4.1 million hectares sown in the same period last year, according to a release by the state agriculture government.

items.title: HAL: After underwhelming 2024, hopes now rest on next fiscal for a take-off
items.description: Revenue growth slowed in Q2 FY25 amid execution delays

items.title: Afcons Infrastructure shares surge 5% to record high as Investec initiates with 'buy'
items.description: Analysts at the firm see Afcons as an excellent play on the government capex cycle.

items.title: Wipro shares rise on $40 million deal to buy US firm Applied Value Tech
items.description: This purchase is expected to bolster Wipro’s existing application services capabilities and create new growth opportunities.

items.title: MFs stick to 1,082 stocks in 2024, add only 67 new positions
items.description: MFs’ additions to new stock have come primarily through IPOs listed in the past two years, data shows.

items.title: RVNL stock rises 2% as firm bags Rs 270-cr order from Maharashtra Metro
items.description: The project covers the construction of seven elevated metro stations in Reach 3A—Hingna Mount View, Rajiv Nagar, Wanadongri, APMC, Raipur, Hingna Bus Station, and Hingna

items.title: What makes Prudent Corporate Advisory a worthy stock despite pricey valuation
items.description: Given its asset-light business model, Prudent generates a healthy free cash flow that can be used as a war chest for inorganic growth during a downturn in equity markets

items.title: NCC Limited: Strong outlook, but valuations cap upside
items.description: NCC has retained its FY25 order inflow guidance of Rs 20,000-22,000 crore, indicating a strong pick-up in new orders in the second half.

items.title: Quess Corp shares rise up to 9% after Antique pegs a Rs 1,000 target on rising 'growth momentum'
items.description: The Antique Broking note said the growth momentum is expected to continue for Quess Corp as the company is set to benefit from strong hiring trends across segments.

items.title: Piramal Pharma shares surge 5% after JM Financial recommends Buy, sees 15% topline growth over FY24-27
items.description: The note pointed out that the newly commercialised molecules of Piramal have gained traction. What will also help Piramal Pharma is the anticipation of a recovery in the US biotech sector in H2FY25, the JM Financial note said.

items.title: Railway stocks mixed as some profit booking kicks in, but optimism remains high
items.description: Shares of railway stocks Railtel Corp, Texmaco Rail, Rail Vikas Nigam, Titagarh Rail, Jupiter Wagons and IRFC surged 15-26 percent in the past month.

items.title: Sebi appoints forensic auditor to look into realtor TARC's financial statements, stock slumps 10%
items.description: TARC added to the company filing that it is providing all necessary information as sought by the regulator.

items.title: Indoco Remedies shares fall up to 6% after USFDA warning letter over Goa facility
items.description: Indoco Remedies said it is in touch with the regulator regarding matter. "We will work with the USFDA to resolve these issues at the earliest," Indoco added.
